product_name: Color WowStyle On Steroids Texturizing Spray
summary: SummaryColor Wow Style On Steroids Color-Safe Texturizing Spray delivers instant big hair + sexy, long-lasting texture without stiffness.
details: DetailsBenefitsUnique moisturizing texture spray won't dry hair or glue strands togetherTransparent texturizers won't cloud or dull colorGives hair "guts" and long-lasting style memoryNon-yellowingNever sticky or stiffHeat protectantKey IngredientsFormulated with translucent moisturizing elastomers, so it won't leave white chalky residues, dehydrate your hair, or "glue" hair strands together when you use heat styling tools.Hybrid copolymers give your hair long-lasting style memory.Formulated WithoutParabenSulfateGlutenItem 2507217How To UseWhen using a curling iron or flat iron, spray hair section by section for bouncy curls or straight hair that moves.For major volume and fuller-looking hair, flip head upside down and spray under-layers.For sexy, undone texture, spray through midsection layers and rake through with fingers.IngredientsHydrofluorocarbon 152-A, Butane, Alcohol Denat. Vp/Va Copolymer, Trisiloxane, PEG/PPG-17/18 Dimethicone, Zeolite, Glycerin, Acetyl Triethyl Citrate, Fragrance (Parfum), Citronellol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Linalool, Hydroxyisohexyl 3-Cyclohexene Carboxaldehyde.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsShipping Restrictions : This item cannot be shipped via air.
how_to_use: When using a curling iron or flat iron, spray hair section by section for bouncy curls or straight hair that moves.For major volume and fuller-looking hair, flip head upside down and spray under-layers.For sexy, undone texture, spray through midsection layers and rake through with fingers.

reviews.headline: I would not buy this product again! Whether you are black
reviews.comments:
I bought this product because it could be used on dry hair, and it didn't leave hard, crusty hair!
I have very  fine hair, I tried it &  it ended up hard and crusty and Yes, I tried to style my hair & A lot of my hair was pulled out! 
Won't buy this product again!

reviews.headline: I would definitely buy this product again
reviews.comments: I love this stuff  it doesn't make your hair hard like hair spray and it holds your t in the  place like all day holds your style perfectly

reviews.headline: Best texturizer!
reviews.comments: I have very fine hair that is also somewhat thin and am always looking for products that can give me lift and volume.  This product does it in spades!   My hair continues to be full until my next washing.  I highly recommend this product!

reviews.headline: Don't buy the hype
reviews.comments: This product is so disappointing. It's basically just a cheap hairspray and dry shampoo mixed together. But it doesn't do either of those things. First and foremost it leaves a white cast on your hair that you have to wash out. You can't brush it out. It does not (!) add lift or volume or texture. It does not (!) add hold or enhance curls. It feels awful. Crunchy sticky brittle. If you try to run your fingers through your hair, you can't. It will just rip your hair out. And you can't sleep on it because the crunch is so loud, it will seriously keep you awake. Don't buy this. Don't buy the hype videos of this giving models bouncy, voluminous hair. They can't possibly be real. I was excited to try some of the other wow products. And for the price? Wow!

reviews.headline: All hype only
reviews.comments: Didn't work for me at all hust the hype no volume just hair spray i belived tiktok and it did me so wrong don't recommend it

reviews.headline: Would recommend
reviews.comments: Wow products have never done me wrong. This product line is amazing and anything they have is true to the description.

reviews.headline: really adds volume it's great
reviews.comments: great stuff a friend told me about how it adds puffiness to flat hair it really does.

reviews.headline: Literally the worst
reviews.comments: Not only does it not provide any volume or hold, it just leaves my hair looking ratty and gunky

reviews.headline: I would not buy this product again and I will return
reviews.comments: This product did not provide enough body and hold to even justify using it.  It left my hair feeling gross with out providing the texture it promised to provide.  Disappointed.

reviews.headline: not good!!
reviews.comments: I've seen so many videos recommending this stuff and since i love everything else color wow has i said ok let's get it. in all videos it says it does not leave you hair feeling gritty and just nasty and this did that. it also left a big white spot in some parts. I literally hate this product my fine hair looks so stiff and ugly. my hands and combs go threw so nasty. I have to rewatch my hair and do everything over again because I hate this feeling in my hair so much. I should of just stood with the spray I know best and that's the bumble and bumble thickening spray. it never did this to me smh. I feel disgusted and very disappointed!!

reviews.headline: No lift and greasy
reviews.comments:
After watching a bunch of ads I decided to try it out. Unfortunately, it just made my hair greasy and weighed it down. Made me have to wash the same night after using, when I normally was every 2days. 
I tried spraying a little/ a lot/top of head/flipped upside down, nothing made it work. I have fine/medium hair. 
So disappointed! Still searching for my volume unicorn.

reviews.headline: No lift and greasy
reviews.comments:
After watching a bunch of ads I decided to try it out. Unfortunately, it just made my hair greasy and weighed it down. Made me have to wash the same night after using, when I normally was every 2days. 
I tried spraying a little/ a lot/top of head/flipped upside down, nothing made it work. I have fine/medium hair. 
So disappointed! Still searching for my volume unicorn.

reviews.headline: Just ok
reviews.comments: This product was just ok for me,  gives my hair texture but does not last.

reviews.headline: Amazing!
reviews.comments:
I have purchased this time and time again! For reference: I have thick, coarse, naturally dry and frizzy hair! It's so thick / heavy that it can easily "deflate" and / or be hard to create lift at the roots! 

I dry my hair w/a Blow Dry Brush (L'ange Le Volume). Style On Steroids is a heat protectant, MOISTURIZING, AND has "style memory," so AFTER my hair is DRY, still working in the same section I just dried - I will spray in my DRY hair - to the roots - but as far (up to 8 inches) away as possible … and THEN BLOW "DRY" it in w/my blow dry brush. This method gives my hair extra volume, helps my blow dry volume AND style LAST, and my hair is SUPER soft and silky until I shampoo it again!! 

Its ALSO fantastic if you CURL your hair to spray the DRY section BEFORE you curl it … same reasons as blow drying it in! 

Of COURSE it's GREAT to use in the traditional texturizing spray methods, too!! After styling and for 2nd, 3rd day, etc hair.

reviews.headline: Contains PFAS as first ingredient
reviews.comments: Hydrofluorocarbon 152a is the first ingredient. That is a PFAS! You inhale it when its sprayed and it can also absorb into your skin! Europe banned it but we havent! You are free to choose what works best but this company can do better. There are enough chemicals in many products buy this one is a def no-no for me.

reviews.headline: The can came with know spray nozzle I can't use it
reviews.comments: I love wow products but the can of textures spray I can't use it has no spray nozzle

reviews.headline: Sticky!
reviews.comments: After all the great reviews I read, I was excited to try this product. It instantly made my hair very sticky, more so than any hairspray I have used. I didn't notice an increase in volume either. Very disappointing!

reviews.headline: Literally confidence in a bottle
reviews.comments: My hair is so thin, so fine, and historically, cannot hold a shape at all. I spent the majority of my 20s with my hair in a high bun because that was the best i could do to feign some amount of volume. However, fast forward to my 30s - I found a haircut that I love, I bought a hair dryer that works, and most importantly, I found a texture spray that I love. Y'all, this spray has literally changed my life. I've tried plenty of hairsprays, texture sprays, creams, mousses, dry shampoos, YOU NAME IT. From cheap to higher-end, nothing seemed like a perfect fix until my stylist recommended this. I am not historically a splurger when it comes to hair, but this bottle is worth every penny. For the first time since elementary school, I *love* wearing my hair down.

reviews.headline: love
reviews.comments: I've used this a few times for volume and texture, I have very fine, straight and flat hair. While it's not my favorite volumizing product because it makes my hair feel kinda gross. But I love this because I spray it in my hair before curling and it makes my curls last for days, without it my hair won't hold a curl.

reviews.headline: Very disappointing
reviews.comments: Used this once.  It made my hair feel dirty and didn't give much volume.

media.headline: I would buy this product again and again!

faceoff_positive.comments: It was 8 months ago that I damaged my hair so badly I thought I might just shave my head. Devastating. Thinking that product might just be medicine, I experimented with some of the most expensive product. FINALLY I found Color Wow! I am so very happy with all products. I am 64 years old with shoulder length, layered, colored, thick, wavy hair. I thought my age was finally taking it's toll on me. Nope! I live in Florida so with coloring, the sun and styling, I just over did it. Color Wow x-strength dreamcoat was the beginning of my healing. I use Kale and Coconut leave-in conditioner. I just bought one minute and "money". Styling is based on where I am: office, beach, home. So the product I use is based on that. No matter what, everything is about healthy, beautiful hair. The best part of all of this is that you don't feel like you have heavy gook on your hair. I can run my fingers through my hair and it all feels so natural. I love it when my significant other can play with my hair and I don't have to feel self conscience with product. I've made an investment in Color Wow and it really is paying off in spades. Silly, but I love the packaging when delivered. It almost looks like a gift with the pretty pink tissue paper. :) The last thing is, I go to a top salon. the salon specializes is a product that is upscale and well known. Even my stylist noticed a difference in my hair and asked my what I use. She's going to use Color Wow now also even though the salon features a major competitor. Go figure! Thank you, Color Wow! I'm so thankful I found you. :)
faceoff_positive.headline: WOW!

faceoff_negative.comments:
I bought this spray to use when I put my hair up in a pony tail. I have a lot of hair, so I like to use texture sprays because it doesn't glue my hair down like hairspray, keeps bumps of hair from happening on the top of my head when I'm using a brush to smooth everything out, and controls my fly aways. I read the glowing reviews and the price was better than LivingProof, so I bought this. 

I sprayed a light layer - couldn't tell anything was on my hair. Sprayed again and used my brush to make sure everything was in place. This spray made my hair look like I had dandruff! It left behind a thick, while glue-like particles in hair and it was stuck to my brush. What a waste of money.
faceoff_negative.headline: Um, no.
